info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 4:40PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL MORA COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM MDT... At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 11 miles west of Wagon Mound, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Wagon Mound, Valmora, and Shoemaker. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 368 and 394. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor your preferred media outlets and NOAA Weather Radio for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
